Description: Welcome to this true gem built in 2017. Situated on the desirable Winford Way, this home offers convenient access to Winchester's vibrant downtown area, renowned schools, parks, shopping, dining, and major commuter routes.The open layout seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas, creating a perfect space for entertaining or enjoying quality family time. The gourmet kitchen designed by Bespoke of Winchester is a chef's dream, featuring BlueStar gas range, sub-zero fridge and freeze, Bosch dishwasher and wine fridge. granite countertops, ample cabinet space, and a center island that doubles as a breakfast bar. Cooking and hosting gatherings will be a breeze in this thoughtfully designed culinary haven.
